text: قُلۡ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡمَلُواْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمۡ إِنِّي عَٰمِلٞۖ فَسَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ

translation.en: Say, "O my people, work according to your position, [for] indeed, I am working; and you are going to know
translation.id: Katakanlah (Muhammad), "Wahai kaumku! Berbuatlah menurut kedudukanmu, aku pun berbuat (demikian). Kelak kamu akan mengetahui
